title: Person of Interest: Reese VS Elias Henchmen
author: POI Fights
comment: This was the very first scene I ever saw of the show. Made a hell of a good first impression. Reese kneecapping the guy at the door still makes me laugh, no matter how many times I've seen it.
After a few years, these scenes still give me goosebumps.
Awesome scène thanks  a lit for uploading it

Reese:  What will you be having today? 
Moretti: What are you suggestions?
Reese: Normally I'd suggest  lead with a side of gunpowder, but we have a special tonight, Moretti. It's called "rescue".
Elias went from trying to have Detective Carter killed to avenging her death!
description: Fight Scene from S01 X 19: Flesh and Blood
